name: Dark Dead Horror Forest 2: Scary FPS Survival Game
name_original: Dark Dead Horror Forest 2: Scary FPS Survival Game
description:
As an experienced US soldier who after long military training was sent to a scary apocalypse mission in dark horror forest, you will prepare a real zombie massacre.

The apocalypse day has come. Let's see how long you will survive...
